goals.active: Find out what the papermaker knows about the parchment.
goals.complete: Cin Fursarai was hard to deal with, but he finally admitted who bought the unusual stationery: Minister Julius Zamon.

goals.active: Report Minister Zamon's bandit involvement to Captain Thackeray.
goals.complete: I reported to Captain Thackeray, and he's eager to find hard evidence to convict Minister Zamon of treason. Logan has asked me to assist the investigation. I have to decide between searching Zamon's home, or questioning people who know him. We don't have time to do both.
